Title: Requires colleges and universities in the state to have education programs for prospective teachers, administrators, and counselors for teaching immigrant-origin students
Summary: Requires the city university of New York and state university of New York have education programs for prospective teachers, administrators, and counselors for teaching immigrant-origin students that promotes diversity, equity and inclusion, and is multilingual.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring colleges and universities in the state to adopt a policy that requires students in programs for teaching, school administration, or counseling to have a curriculum that promotes diversity, equity and inclusion, and is multilingual for teaching immigrant-origin students
